name: Ryan Robinson
text:
Best Experience Possible!
I used to think that chiropractic work was some sort of medieval practice but Eastern Shore Chiropractic has shown me that it really is advanced comprehensive medicine.

The knowledgeable and friendly staff take a comprehensive approach to treat the issue. They start with a thorough evaluation of the issue and all necessary x-rays, they then create a treatment plan that includes addressing all components of the issue at hand: treating muscles, fascia, and of course the skeletal structure.

Before being treated for my chronic and debilitating neck/spine pain I didn't think I would ever recover. Now, I have hope that I won't have to deal with this the rest of my life! They don't only treat the issue, they also really focus on creating a at-home physical therapy plan to also address what is creating the issue.

Do not consider anywhere else, Eastern Shore Chiropractic is by far the best option, no matter the issue.

resp.text: Ryan, we really appreciate your review! Thank you!

He used ART on my hip, glutes and legs. It took about 4 weeks of visits, but he finally got me back to running. I learned a lot of useful stretches and ways to take care of myself when running.

I have recommended their office to many people and will continue to do so. They're professional, friendly and caring!

name: Jonathan Hoffmann
text:
I have seen Dr. Justin for a few different issues over the past year.  After finding his contact information on the A.R.T. providers page, I decided to schedule an appointment.  I was initially hesitant, as I live in Pensacola and would need to drive almost an hour to get to Fairhope.  I can say that each and every trip I make down for an appointment is absolutely worth it.  Unlike other practitioners that I've seen, Dr. Justin took the time to listen to my concerns and give me feedback.  I didn't feel like another patient on the assembly line.

I was also impressed with his ability to provide me with some immediate relief.  Using A.R.T., Dr. Justin was able to help me alleviate some nagging hip flexor pain, and also give me more range of motion in my knee, in one visit.  While some follow-up visits are required to completely alleviate certain issues, I was impressed with how quickly I felt relief.  It was also helpful to know that Dr. Justin was involved in the same workout program as me, so he really understood the nature of my pain.  It's nice to be treated someone who appears to "practice what they preach" in terms of living a healthful life.

And lastly, the staff at Eastern Shore Chiropractic & Sports Clinic is outstanding.  I'm always greeted by friendly faces when I walk in the door and have never had an issue getting an appointment at a time that is convenient for me.  They are honest, and even notified me of a credit that I had on my account that I was unaware of.  I would whole-heartedly recommend Dr. Justin to my family and friends for any sort of sports-related pain issues.

resp.text: ThanksJonathan, we really appreciate this wonderful review. We pride ourselves on helping all our patients not only obtain pain relief but also helping them understand what is causing the pain. We feel that all of our patients are family and as family we want them to feel at home whenever they visit us. Thanks again and please stay in touch.

name: Cheryl Martin
text:
I went for my first experience with acupuncture a few days ago. I was a bit nervous, but had read enough research articles on the benefits to encourage me to try it. Foti is very knowledgeable about his practice, and great about talking you through the procedures. We had an in-depth consultation at the beginning, and he also suggested different supplements and dietary changes for my injury/lifestyle. The actual acupuncture portion was much more enjoyable and relaxing than I anticipated. He had calming music playing with low lighting. After telling him in the consultation that I get cold easily, he put a heated lamp over my feet without me even asking. When he placed the first needle, I immediately felt the tension and pain in my neck and shoulder melt away. He also used electro stimulation on some of the needles, and it felt amazing. I laid on the table with the needles for about 30 minutes, I’m honestly guessing because I fell asleep! After he removed them, he massaged the area and used a menthol spray. The rest of the day I felt incredibly relaxed, and I slept GREAT!
As a nurse, I can see first hand how this therapy can be great when used with other methods and treatments for injuries and stress. If you’re on the fence about trying this therapy, I hope my experience can help encourage you to go for it!

text: I went to HealthSource for some relief in my jaw, which has caused pain in my neck and head. I didn't see the chiropractor stationed there, but I was seen by a fill-in female chiropractor from a nearby HealthSource. The staff were very nice, informative, and answered all of my questions. Immediately, they took X-Rays and said they would be contacting me after they review my records. It took them one day to call back, which amazed me. I returned and was quickly given an estimated cost for 25 sessions, after insurance was applied. The amount for the sessions was way out of my budget range, so I never became an official patient. But that is the ONLY reason I did not seek help from this establishment. Aside from cost, everything else was easy, and again, I can't say enough about the staff there. They were excellent. I wish I could have fit their sessions into my budget.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words. If we can be of help in the future, please give us a call. We now have several options to help with finances.

name: Ken Priest
text:
I have been attended by several chiropractic services in this area and across the country. I find that the majority of chiropractors tend to stick with the methods taught by the particular schools they attended. This is not what I look for in a chiropractor or chiropractic services.
I look for forward thinking doctors who have expanded on and are not limited to what they were initially taught. In particular, I look for one who works with kinesiology,  one who is particularly focused on the relationship between the muscles not only with the bones, but with each other and the energy relationship with other factors in our bodies and in our minds and surroundings.
I find Dr. Richard Aplin to be an open minded doctor and practitioner who can learn and grow and think outside the box in order to visualize what is happening within our bodies and respond with corrective/directive measures.
I find him to be the most effective chiropractor for my needs in this geographic area.

resp.text: Thanks for your thorough review, Ken - we really appreciate it!!

name: Lorren Bailey
text:
This is a long review but worth the read.

Dr. Aplin is an amazing doctor! He takes chiropractor care to levels no one has ever heard of in this town. Let's be real for a moment, almost every who's had pain at some point in their life has gone to a chiropractor for help. The standard way of thinking is that if you could just get that elbow to pop back or to have a hip or shoulder reset then all your pain would go away. But it never works, you might find some mild relief but it's usually short lived by a couple of hours to maybe days and then you wake up and say, you slept wrong and it's out again.

Well the team at Invision chiropractic care will teach you how to do address the underlying problems so you can fix it yourself in the long run. Yes you will get adjusted, yes it will probably hurt (Dr. Aplin has a different approach to adjusting that I've ever seen) but I'm a walking, breathing, significantly less pain and overall stress less person than when I walked into his office 4 months ago.

I'll be honest, I have a long history of surgeries to pains and only walked in to this office cause I didn't want to have another surgery and my dear friend suggested Dr. Aplin. I went when I truly didn't believe he was helping. I went when the pain spread to a neighboring body part. I went even though my TOC doc said I needed surgery to fix my problem. 4 months and I never missed an appointment. I can say today that I don't need surgery, my pain is gone and the results of becoming less stressed and worry free was worth more to me than the pain getting better.

BrainTap. Google it. Dr. Aplin introduced me to it and has changed my life because of it. I feel like I have the answer to a life long question that I know so many of us ask "How do I feel better?" yes that's generic but let's be honest, everyone is stressing about something these days. But after 4 months of using the BrainTap and doing my homework from Dr. Aplin, I do feel better, lighter able to take on what the world throws at me. It just works!!

resp.text: Lorren - you're a ROCKSTAR! Thanks for being a great patient and showing what you can achieve through commitment and prioritizing your health. We're thankful for you!

name: Levi Harper
text: I have thoroughly enjoyed coming here. Dr. Aplin is very straightforward with what his intentions are and why he feels they are necessary. Any time I have had a "catch" or aching area he is able to relieve it and suggest preventive measures for it not to happen again. Also the staff is great and seem to genuinely care about the patients. I am done with treatments and I get phone calls asking (not pressing) if I would like to come in but also just to see how I am doing. Would recommend if you are looking for a Chiropractor.

If you need any chiropractic help, go to him.

text:

My only regret is waiting until I was 31 to go.
If you have been on the fence about going to a chiropractor and are looking for one you can trust. If given the chance I can say with confidence Jesse Schultz at HealthSource Spanish Fort will change your life and how you view chronic pain. 10/10 kartwheels would recommend and excited for the next appointment.

Great service and great experience every time. Thanks Jesse.

text: I was able to track down Dr. Schultz after he left from the previous establishment I was going to for care. He was the only one that took the time with his patients. When I found out he was in Spanish Fort, I immediately booked an appointment. One thing you will learn, chiropractic care is about teaching you to take care of yourself. You don’t just get adjusted. You learn stretches and strengthening techniques to better your well being. Although Dr. Schultz and I have the same last name, as I can tell we are not related. If you are looking to better your well being you have to come see Dr. Schultz at HealthSource, you and your body will be happy you did.

Please don't suffer if you need care. Dr Meredith will get you back your quality of life you deserve. Also the staff Jim and Carla are so kind and helpful. I can't thank you all enough for your services.

Life time patient,

Therese Crowson

name: Sarah Creech
text:
Skilled, caring professionals.  State-of-the arts equipment.

I had a debilitating ear ache that persisted for over a year.  Doctors examinations found no problem with my ear and I was actually diagnosed as having migraine headaches located in ear area.  Medications helped temporarily, but ear ache always came back.  HealthSource of Spanish Fort was able to determine and fix the source of my ear ache.   The pain was caused by a misalignment in my neck and upper back.  After two months of treatments, I am so happy to say,  my ear is 'pain free.'

Due to an automobile accident years ago, I had a spinal fusion (L4 and L5).  I continue to go to HealthSource monthly for maintenance.  Their massage therapist is wonderful!  A very welcome, affordable member of their staff.  Thank you HealthSource.

I will definitely continue to use them indefinitely!

name: Rachelle Wallace
text: Not very wise.  I was just refused service because I didn't have a mask.  As a chronic asthma sufferer I can't breathe in a mask that is effective against this virus.  I used to live in Montgomery and shop here all the time.  I  came to town for boot repair and was going to shop but you lost me for good.

resp.text:
Hello Rachelle - I couldn't agree more sincerely with you that it is "not very wise" - that is your statement, for you, it you do have chronic asthma, to be out and about in this possibly infectious time without some type of facial covering.

In no way has it been verbally stated, written or implied that someone has to wear an n95 procedural or surgical mask to enter. Our sign, placed in front of the door where you actually have to read it and go around it to access the door states, and I quote exactly: "ATTENTION - IF YOU DO NOT HAVE A MASK OR FACIAL COVERING, PLEASE STAY OUTSIDE. WE WILL CURBSIDE YOUR ORDER. CALL 334-277-9925.

The sign also states: "DUE TO THE RISK OF CONTAMINATION, ALL SALES ARE FINAL - NO REFUNDS."

You were not refused service as you have incorrectly stated - you were refused entrance to the INSIDE of our business since you had no facial covering. You were given the option to our curb side service - which you refused to take advantage of. We provide a nice, socially distanced safe outside sitting area for those without masks or facial coverings to use. We actually have a large amount of customers who prefer the outdoor curbside service and delivery option.

We require this of everyone - regardless of race, color, gender, religious or political orientation. Why you consider yourself some elite exception in that you feel that you have some special entitlement, are better than all our other customers,  and can disregard our store policy, which has been in effect for many months now, I do not know - and there are no exceptions to our store entrance policy. We are a privately owned and operated local, family business - and we set the store policy here.

You are not entitled or above all our other customers who follow the store policy and are very, very happy to be able to shop in such a sanitary, healthy and very friendly 32+ year service and community oriented business

All of us wear our correct facial coverings all day long. We do take short breaks from wearing the coverings when not in the store to allow for C02 reduction and etc - but are right back on when back inside the store.

Funny, but no one here remembers anyone of your mask intolerance issue trying to come in. What ever - there is an outside curbside service area for those reading this post who may have some type of facial mask/covering issue that can benefit from this incident, and know there is an outside curbside service option for them.

We  hope you find your happy place to shop. We are extremely busy assisting our correctly attired and extremely satisfied multi-generational customers.

name: Ty Callahan
text: Although the products can sell themselves employees aren't friendly at all and even if you're spending a lot of money they will give you the wrong item and when you correct them they will try to tell you what THEY use... Like no I asked for this kind and I'm paying. NOW you wanna tell me what you use. Felt like a drug deal or something. Poor customer service maybe racist/biased, I don't know but I know I  felt my business was NOT appreciated will DEFINITELY go somewhere else going forward. Edit: And  I didnt look for manager or ask for names as from atmosphere from the particular employee i was immediately turned off.. And as someone cleverly cross-examines me as "reply" from "management" below I don't feel any different from my experience prior.

resp.text: Hello Ty...have no idea what you were looking for since you weren't working with either me, Willard or Matt...who are the upper management and who one should go to if there is some issue that didn't meet your expectations...you obviously don't frequent our store to know our 30 plus years and history offering 3 generations of persons of all races, religions, orientations and etc to even use the racial bias statement. Since you did not attempt to speak with myself, Willard or Matt...and discuss your issue...that makes it difficult to know and understand your statements...our 3 generational loyal and very appreciative customers know from long term experience that we are a caring business that serves persons of all colors, or whatever differences with equal appreciation and attention...the young cash register clerks are nothing but that and are not meant to give advise or tips on anything other than where products are and to assist you in the checkout process...questions over and above that level should be directed to the management level if seeking advise of any kind...we apoligise in advance if your experience was not what you were looking for, and wish you health and wellness, and we hope you find your happiness in shopping where you so choose...racial bias is not a practise allowed at our business. We wouldn't have been in business for 32 years in Montgomery Alabama where at least half of our customer base are persons of color and different cultural and religious persuasions...also...in closing...let me thank you for your review and any other similar post claiming an inequity or racial bias...your post has actually brought in even more business from our cutomer base calling and coming in to shop and support our loving and caring business even more...best free advertising in a while...so many thanks again...

name: Shenee Furr
text: Steve is amazing he had no problem with help my mom and I find items we were looking for ...Thanks Steve..

resp.text: Thank You Shenee for your post! We try out best to help each and everyone we can! Stay safe!

name: Rosemary Perdue
text:
i have been doing business with Health Wise Foods since 2010 when i discovered the store while taking Hot Yoga classes in the basement.  Then when i got sick.... i became a frequent customer.  The owners, Management and staff have all been supportive, friendly, professional and knowledgeable throughout my journey.  They have been in business 30 years, and have never exhibited any prejudice against anyone.  I was homeless 18  months and they knew it, and helped me to get the best products for my needs to keep me functioning during that time.

Due to my chronic babesia flares,  i have been unable to wear a mask during the ongoing pandemic, and all of the staff have been very helpful getting my products and bringing  them out to my vehicle.  I love the fact that they care about their customers and have gone above and beyond during this time to make sure that those of us who are immune compromised have the natural treatments we need even if we are unable to wear a mask.

Additionally, i love their knowledge.  When i have a weird symptom that im not sure what to do about, they give me suggestions, as well as warnings on contraindications. Both in person and via Facebook.   Healthwise is where i send everyone!

resp.text: Thank You so much for your review Rosemary! You have come along way on your life's journey living with Lyme's and I am so proud to see how much you've learned and shared with so many others dealing with the many trials that come along with it. I enjoy our frequent talks and updates both in person and on FB...and we've had  quite a few over the years! Hopefully we won't have to deal with face mask issues for too much longer...I guess time and common sense will tell. Let me know how your doing with the Kroger Kit protocol. Thanks again for being such a great role model for those with Lyme!

name: Dora J Crow
text: I’ve been shopping at Healthwise for many years, since way before they expanded. I’ve seen them grow into a welcome presence in the natural homeopathic all in one stop shop they are today. They offer so much more than vitamins & minerals. Fresh organic sustainable food, and dry goods that rival any large grocery store. I’ve bought probiotics, prebiotics, vitamins, minerals, alkaline water and so much more. They offer local products too, like honey and candles. The personalized one on one service they offer is above and beyond any local store. They are kind, compassionate and helpful to anyone asking questions when faced with so many choices. Anything and everything they ever suggested for me helped me so much. Now, with the Covid-19, they are asking people to wear masks in the store or plan to call ahead and order what you need and they will bring it out to you, curbside. People complaining they cannot wear a mask have the alternative to call from their car, make an order and literally in seconds they bring it to your car. I also have health issues where I cannot breath if I wear a mask. I ordered a couple minutes before reaching their store and had my purchase soon as I pulled into the parking lot. I don’t understand people thinking the store staff try to push only the products that they use themselves. They have not done that to me in all my times in store. Well. That doesn’t include the time they suggested some tasty tea, though. All in all, there’s not another place around that offers what Healthwise Foods does. Check them out for yourself. Call or visit them today! Check out their local honey and candles!

resp.text: Thank You Dora for your great review! We appreciate you sharing your experiences while shopping with us for the many years we've had the pleasure of assisting you. I am so glad you mentioned the outside curbservice available for those who either forgot their facial covering or have some issue where they can't tolerate the mask for certain reasons. Will be glad when the new batches of honey become available soon. The candles are such a nice product to have on hand for your own enjoyment or as great gifts...made from the beeswax that the honey comes from at Sweet Bee. Very green oriented to not waste the beeswax and make a great product at the same time! Thanks again for sharing your experiences and helping with the awareness of the common sense in using a facial covering at this time!

name: Danny Randolph
text:
If you are serious about your health you need not go anywhere else. Healthwise is the store you have been searching for!

I have shopped at Healthwise for over 15 years. The owners stay on the leading edge of knowledge related to health and nutrition. They are always available to assist you with answering your questions. They have never rushed me and they take the time to answer all my questions. I trust them for their extensive knowledge of nutritional and holistic treatments and practices.

Additionally, I trust them to validate and verify that their suppliers are actually providing the product identified on the package. Many large chain stores and grocery stores sell brands that are nothing but sawdust and powder. You can be confident you are getting the product on the label. They also sell grass-fed beef and other meat products that are healthy for you -- not full of hormones and antibiotics.

The owners require their staff members to train on which herbs or supplements would be the best solution to address whatever health condition you are trying to treat. The staff is very friendly and they are right there to help you if you have a health related question, or you can't find a product you are looking for.

I realize the are other health stores in the local marketplace. I have stepped into some of them as I was driving around town. I was curious about their knowledge of health and nutrition, the suppliers they purchased from, and the prices they were charging for the different products I regularly purchase. I could not find any store who could match the knowledge of owners and staff at Healthwise. The range of products were usually not as extensive as Healthwise and the prices were comparable to Healthwise.

I trust the owners of Healthwise and the quality of the products they sell. I will continue to purchase my health related items from them!

Amanda's office staff is friendly and she and her staff are constantly going out of their way to provide excellent customer service. Whether it's scheduling an appointment, or needing to bring the kids with me, the staff is always helpful.
One thing that stands out about Amanda's chiropractic care which separates her from other chiropractors, is she is always going to seminars and learning the latest techniques. She is very passionate about what she does and wants to provide the best care possible. If you pick Health Source for your chiropractic care, you will not be disappointed!

name: Joseph Clark
text: Became a patient here after an car accident. From my very first appointment, I was well taken care of. The staff is amazing and they genuinely believe in what they do. They educate you, work with your schedule, and above all, they really do care about you and your health on a personal level. Medplus truly stands apart from other chiropractic clinics.

text: new patient. visiting family in the area for the holidays. Someone at Southeast Health circle E. Rehab heard me talking with my mom and suggested Dr. Z. (my Thanksgiving miracle). The prices are reasonable and they also have packages for payment/ treatment plans.

resp.text: Thank you Latoiya!

name: James DeWick
text: Came in to do stem cells thinking that it would be my only option for relieving chronic pain in my knees. Dr Z gave me an examination and a chiropractic session that relieved most if not all of the pain in my knees instantly. Now we are doing blood work and other tests to determine underlying causes of this issue. I’m very happy I went with Dr Z because he’s a truly honest and caring person. Thank you !

text: The personnel are very friendly. When I walked in and heard the 70’s light rock over the sound system I knew this was my kind of place. I went in for lower back pain that kept me nearly immobile for a week. I came here after reading the reviews, desperate for relief. I felt great after my initial visit and with my continuing therapy feeling better each day. I’m also learning a lot from the doc about my health and how to maintain it without pharmaceuticals.

resp.text: Glad to hear you are feeling better Jamie, Thank you for the nice review!

name: James Avery
text: Dr. Z is amazing and acupuncture works! I no longer have to suffer through near constant nerve pain. Dr. Z listens carefully to symptoms and issues and treats accordingly. Through incredible ancient practice, he is teaching my body how to heal itself. I recommend Medplus to anyone for any aliment or struggle you face.

resp.text: So happy you are feeling better James.

name: Johanna Lodder
text:
I was in a car accident, ended up with neck fusion herniated disc, lots of pain.  Considering I never used a primary care doctor before this because I didn't need one, went to gynecologist yearly, that was it. Suddenly it was lots of doctors tests etc.  Spent the last two years with orthopedic, chiropractors, muscular therapists but still in pain, still not able to sleep well.   Pain changes you....but I wasn't going to give up yet. My primary care Dr. recommended Lions Mane and Dr Z. Ordered the supplement on Amazon started taking it, it really helped with brain fog from concussion. So I headed off to Dr Z, not expecting too much, I was already seeing a chropracter.  Wow, what a difference, decompression has reduced the nagging pain, the first morning after, I woke up because I was rested!  Hadn't done that since...before accident.  I get up now in the morning and can feel my feet, and walk normally, not like I have flippers.  I had ligaments and muscles whining and complaining, because now my hips were staying where they should and everything had to stretch.  But I did my stretches and my ankles and left leg aren't hurting like they did.
I am actually thinking about exercising again,  this experience has made me hopefull again.  Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review and I am so happy that you are doing so much better!

name: Jasmine Mathis
text: It's easy to integrate a holistic view of heath here. The environment here feels like you are amongst friends, not a sterile impersonal place to churn through "patients".  Doc Z and staff are genuine and show they care in every way!

resp.text: We appreciate the positive review Jasmine.

name: Donielle McLendon
text:
I injured myself almost 4 years ago. My left foot and sciatic nerve have caused me to be in almost constant pain since. Before the injury, I ran about 30-45 miles per week, but I have not been able to workout with any regularity since, and it was depressing. I have seen 2 orthopedic surgeons, another chiropractor, a podiatrist, an acupuncturist (a different practice), and massage therapists with little relief. It’s not that they were bad, but they weren’t looking in the right place. He really listened to me and I appreciate that.
Dr. Zlotea has been treating me for the past few weeks for a herniated disc and other issues. He recommended using decompression therapy and it has worked wonders! I don’t think I would have been able to workout again if not for him. I’m only 32 and finally don’t feel like I’m 102. I am able to start light exercise again as of today and I couldn’t be happier! My foot doesn’t hurt at all anymore! I feel like I’m getting my life back.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Brandon!

resp.text: Thank you Angela!

name: Kendall Jackson
text:
As some of you may remember, in November 2011 I was involved in a vehicular hit and run on Ross Clark Circle, in which I was a pedestrian. To give you an idea of the impact, it fragmented my tibia and fibula in half (lower leg bones). I incurred a lot of bodily damage. At one point I could barely walk due to the various pains due to misalignment. The photo attached shows how much of my skin was removed by the ground, although and I was wearing a pea coat at the time of the incident. To keep things short, I'm less afraid of vehicles passing me on my morning runs than I am to try a new chiropractor. I love the down-to-Earth atmosphere at his office. I strongly recommend you at least give it a few visits to see if his structure is right for you. It only took me ONCE.

Thank you Dr. Z

Kendall Jackson

name: Charlie Crowe
text: I was a little disappointed with my visit. Before I had done the in take paper work as a new patient we were talking about  12 visit plan. I didn’t feel that I was heard. There seemed to be an agenda other than my condition. I will say that they had me in and out fast.

resp.text:
Thank you for your review. Your input is appreciated.
Your perspective on the first visit is different than most of our patients but significant. The intake paperwork asks the patient to list all their symptoms and quantify their health complaints and instructs the patients to quantify their level of improvement over the next 12 treatments.... That is correct. The reason the paperwork addresses a treatment plan is so patients are aware from the beginning that holistic treatment is not a one treatment panacea, it's not a pill and it's not magic. It is a healing process and the specifics are handled individually with each patient.
A 20 minutes face to face with a physician is unheard of these days and if you feel that was a short visit so be it. In a 20-minute visit we addressed the entire human frame above and beyond the chief complaint plus acupuncture and tongue analysis. The process didn't stop when you left the office but it continued as the tongue analysis was performed by OUM physicians in California and THERE WERE THREE EMAIL CONVERSATIONS REGARDING THE SPECIFICS. That was a step I take out of true concern for the health and well-being of my patients but it's cases like these that make excellent physicians become callus.
Best of luck on your journey and next time find something to praise about the next person that gives a damn about your health and well-being

name: litt Odom
text:
I began seeing Dr. Liang for the treatment of some very intense post-Covid skin issue symptoms. I was experiencing an unprecedented psoriasis outbreak, to a degree that I’d NEVER experienced before, about a month and a half after recovering from Covid. I knew I wanted to treat this naturally and in a way that would actually result in my body healing, not just a topical western-medicine style treatment.

With Dr. Liang I began an herbal treatment and a weekly acupuncture and moxibustion. Dr. Liang also gave me two cupping treatments as well as two rounds of blood letting (for itching) and after a month and a half of regular weekly treatments and daily herbal intake, I’m happy to say my psoriasis outbreak is almost entirely healed, something I thought wasn’t possible.

Healing psoriasis is a gut-related health journey, a journey that doesn’t happen quickly.  Under the skillful care of Dr. Liang, I have experienced incredible results which have resulted in my body’s natural balance being restored and my skin returning to a normal, healed state.

So grateful to Dr. Liang for helping my body heal. Montgomery is so lucky to have such a knowledgeable practitioner of Chinese Medicine!  She will help you!

10/10 would recommend.

text: I have had acupuncture before, and it was not painful. This lady stuck a needle very deep into the inside of my wrist area and it imbedded deeply into a nerve (trust me, it was a nerve. I know nerve pain) I jumped in horrible pain and asked her to take it out right away, she called me a "big baby". She does not speak English very well, and this lead to a huge language barrier I could not understand what she was saying, and I needed to. When I asked her to explain (because I had no idea what she was talking about) she said sharply to me "Why are you quizzing me?". Omg. It truly was a very bad experience. I finally had to ask the American man behind the desk the important question about what she did, because she would not.

name: Stella Dallas
text: Treatments work. Needs to learn how to be tactful and not insulting to patients.  Questions out of no where: what color your poop? You eat ice cream today? No more ice cream or meat, eat too much. Also, she doesnt really speak English so when she tells you to take some of her supplements you dont even know why you are taking them.  One time she gave me a bottle and told me to take 30 pills a day.  The writing on the bottle was Chinese. I tried and then just chunked the bottle. The pills were little pebble balls.

name: Bong Kim
text:
Horrible place. No recommendation at all.
If you are looking for medical treatment for your recent accident and pursuing insurance claim,
this place will be your worst nightmare.

My wife had an accident and got treatments (paid out of our pocket first - over $700) and delayed almost two months!
Insurance company can not confirm their business info anywhere.
Their info that they gave me and insurance company never came up with correct return, when insurance company ran their info to government website.
Even I, personally visit and ask, it take 2-3 weeks to get the right tax report info.

The old man, sitting at the front desk, always says

"I already sent all info they asked"

but if I asked when he sent, and where he sent, he never gave me answer.
even what he sent, !!!!!!!

always saying these
"I don't remember."
"I sent it in the pre-addressed envelope."
"I don't know, anyway I sent it."
"Maybe you need to find a lawyer."

I am telling you this because they (Dr and husband) are not saying these until they get paid.
Before starting your treatment, they will tell you that they have had no problem with any insurance company to be reimbursed.
After treatments, after delayed payment  over months, then they will not care.
because they get paid all out of your pocket first.

Hey, for my case, all I experience is rack of professionalism.
They don't even know under what information, they are running their business.

resp.text:
We understand that the patient is having a hard time getting an reimbursement from their auto insurance carrier. It is stated on a sign at our reception area that we do not file insurance at our clinic. Some insurance company may not understand the value of Acupuncture and Chinese medicine yet.  For patients who has acupuncture benefits with their insurance company, we try our best to assist them by providing forms with medical coding and other information needed. Patient needs to contact their insurance carrier to find out their coverage and it is never guaranteed on our part if insurance will cover.

Note that CMS-1500 form, a superbill, and patient's medical record are the common types of documents for insurance company to proceed the claim. This patient's company has requested tax documents, which is out of  our responsibility to provide. knowing it contains many personal information on the documents, no doctor office would give out copies of this kind.  But because we had wanted to help our patient to receive payment we cooperated fully with Mr. Kim and the representative at Geico. We have provided the insurance representative with our tax return information, our tax ID number, all of the business names we have used, all of the business addresses we have used in the last 10 years, and our NPI number. In addition, we filled out a W9 form from the IRS and returned it to Geico in their return envelope. We do not know what additional information they need. It seems that their problem is with GEICO not us. GEICO refuses to recognize us as a legitimate business even though we have a tax id number, have filed income tax returns for 12 years, have state and city business licenses, have a website, telephone listing and Facebook page.

We thank the patient for taking time to notify us of the complaint. Patient satisfaction is a critical component of quality patient care in our practice.

name: Leslee Gaston
text:
Okay... so I’m going to start by saying I’m skeptical about chiropractors... BUT Dr. Waldeck is worth it! I couldn’t fathom paying this much money to a doctor until now.

I’ve always been the patient that lacked commitment because I never could find what I needed. I would get discouraged and stop going after a few sessions. After visiting a few other chiropractors in Athens, I wasn’t having any pain relief. Sometimes, I’d leave in more pain than when I walked in. I expressed these concerns with Dr. Waldeck, and he took me seriously. I walk out pain free every time.

He is the only doctor ever that has been able to pop my back in multiple spots. My entire life, I’ve had one person be able to pop my back well until this point.

The staff is absolutely amazing as well. They are always welcoming and encouraging. They truly care about their patients. The thoroughness the whole staff exhibits is also shocking. They make sure everything is covered and you leave without pain. They ask after every session if it was okay. They are helpful, kind, and patient when I am confused or struggling. They also remember little details about my personal life and ask me about them every time I’m there. It makes me feel more comfortable while I’m there.

Overall, this has been, is, and will hopefully continue to be the best experience of my life. I look forward to going to every appointment (even though it takes me thirty minutes to get there and thirty minutes home after a long day at work!).

Seriously... try Dr. Waldeck. He is worth your time and money. I promise.

name: Vanesa Benavidez
text: I just love the whole atmosphere in the office. Dr. Jumper, Holli, Jordan and Jessica are all amazing. They're always so nice and welcoming. They're always happy to answer any questions I have and explain everything I need and want to know about my road to recovery. I always feel better walking out of the office than I do walking in and that makes me really happy. It feels great to feel less and less pain with every visit and getting my body back to normal. I owe it all to Dr. Jumper and his amazing staff of ladies.

name: Bonnie Benavidez
text: Dr. Jumper and his staff are the best! I always look forward to coming into the office for my treatment because I know I'll be walking out feeling so much better.  I love the atmosphere in the office, it's so calming and relaxing. Dr. Jumper, Jordan, Holli and Jessica are just so nice and friendly, they make you feel like family. Everyone is so helpful and caring. My wife also starting coming to get treatments for her feet and we just love this place and we are definitely going to be sad when we move back to Texas

name: Heather Hartline
text: Dr. Jumper and his staff are the absolute best!  They take extremely good care of their patients and treat us like family!  I would highly recommend them. Just a great experience all the way around and my back feels great!!!

name: Kate Chadderdon
text: This place is awesome! The whole staff is ready to answer questions and help you feel better- the doctor explains everything that is going on in a way that puts you at ease! There are no surprises on costs, they tell you exactly what you’ll pay. If you care about your body and well-being you will go to healthsource and get yourself fixed up😀

name: Paula Elam
text: Dr. Jumper and his staff are awesome! They are very professional all while making you feel right at home. I highly recommend.

name: Maddy Jones
text: 10 out of 10 reccomend!! Everyone is so nice and genuinely cares. Theyre always willing to help and figure out whats best for you.

name: Rhonda
text: My experience at HealthSource Florence has been top notch. From the front desk to Dr Jumper, they are professional, courteous and always greet you with a smile. I wasn’t sure if a chiropractor could help after back surgery, but my back is getting better by the day. Definitely a five star experience.

name: marc johnson
text: I can not believe how the women up front treat me. I am at a loss of words. They greet me with a smile and always have a conversation to make you feel comfortable in the building. Dr. Jumper does an outstanding job of working with the patients as well.

name: Kaytlin Culpepper
text:
I love coming to see Dr. Jumper and his team! The ladies up front are super sweet and welcoming. The atmosphere is wonderful, and welcoming. Dr. Jumper has helped pinpoint where my back pain has been.  My neck, and back pain has tremendously gotten better.

I’m super thankful for these guys in helping my pain.

name: Kiara Cooper
text: I came along with my client and the staff were very friendly, understanding, and patient. Being in the establishment is a pure joy, I don’t think that I would recommended anywhere else. Great job !

name: victoria Risner
text:
I just want to say that if you want to feel better, move your arms , be able to walk and regain some quailty of life back after a injury or illness, YOU HAVE TO START HERE !
After suffering for years with MS,FIBRO, AND EVERYTHING that having nerve and muscle damage causes. After countless pills, and many many nights of lack of sleep from pain,
I have found my answer, LOL.
Give them a try, you can't go wrong and I promise you will be feeling like a new person after 1st visit ! And Dr, Jumper and his staff are always friendly and willing to help you get bbetter ! So glad God led me to these people!

name: alan Keach
text: Great Staff !! The treatment they recommended is working really well !! I really like DR. Jumper. I Highly recommend them !!!

name: wilson family
text: Our family has been receiving care from Dr Jumper for a few years. This is one of the best Chiropractor offices that I have been to. The staff is always friendly and assist you with your needs. Dr. Jumper cares about his patiences very much. He is one that will do all he can to help remove your neck and back pain. It has helped tremendously with headaches that I have had from pinched nerves in my neck. I have significantly reduced the amount of over the counter pain relief medicine that really didn’t help. Dr. Jumper is the one you need when your in pain.

name: Dawn Young
text: I was involved in a wreck with  a Semi and have head and neck injuries! With everything Dr. Jumper and  his staff has done, all my hearing has come back! The headaches and ringing in my ears are gone! Thank you for everything you've done! You and your staff are kind and professional! You make my life better! I will always recommend your service! Thank you!!!

name: David Harrison
text: I had never been to a chiropractor before meeting with Dr. Jumper.  He immediately put me at ease and made an assessment of what my needs were and put a treatment plan in place for me.  I had been having lower back pain and after just a few sessions I was back to 100%.  The staff is always friendly and I have always been seen right away at my appointed time.

name: James Wallace
text: Simply the best chiropractor in the Shoals. Dr. Jumper  knows what he is doing!!  Friendly and professional 5⭐service from Jordan, Holli, Kyle and Dr. Jumper. My only regret is I wish I would of started going sooner. THANKS!!!

name: Jonathan Borden
text: Everyone is so friendly and helpful. Highly recommended!!!

name: Samantha Kiger
text: Everyone there is so extremely friendly & helpful! I would definitely recommend them to anyone

name: Jake Todd
text: Dr.Jumper and his amazing staff are the best around.

name: Sandy Poole
text: Dr Jumper and his staff go out of their way to make you comfortable and address any issues you have! Best by far!

name: Sarabeth McLendon Jumper
text: The absolute best Chiropractor in the Shoals area. I’m an athlete and very specific about who works on my body. Not all chiropractors are the same or know what they are doing. Dr. Jumper is amazing and is truly a miracle worker!

name: Deborah Huston
text: The team in Florence is so good to work with and friendly! They have become like family! Check them out! I highly recommend them Dr Jumper takes special care and prices are reasonable.

name: Cylena Pitts
text: I love this place because they have really helped me with my pain in my neck, shoulder and back. It's taken a few visits but it's worth it. The dr doesn't prescribe me with painkillers and I love that. He knows what he's doing. Thanks Dr!!!

name: Brian Veltri
text: Went in recently for the first time. Amazing customer service right off the bat. Super friendly and helpful receptionist who went above and beyond to deliver amazing service. Great clean facility. Doctor explains your diagnosis along with a plan made just for you. This is not your generic chiropractor with a cookie cutter plan. I have already referred three members of my household that are very eager to make an appointment. Very impressed.

name: Kelly Moreland
text: Friendly and caring staff.  The ART Graston Technique that Dr. Jumper is using on my daughter is making her feel so much better.  She been battling a muscle issue for a year now.  So glad this office was referred to us.

name: Angie D
text: To anyone that is in need of a chiropractor or in need of relief from pain. Dr. Jumper at HealthSource of Florence is amazing. Seeing Dr. Jumper would most definitely be worth driving to his office. One of the best chiropractors I’ve ever seen. I would definitely recommend Dr. Jumper.

name: Andrew Massey
text: I have degenerative discs and had been getting shots for years and it wasn't helping. I decided to try this before surgery and I am finally getting some relief. Dr. Jumper, Hannah, and Nicki are always nice and fast. I would recommend them to everyone.

name: Matt Lesley
text: Friendly staff, and most importantly quality care! I feel great! What more can you ask for??

name: Erika Berry
text: PLEASE READ! The office manager at this business is ABSOLUTELY THE MOST RUDE AND DISRESPECTFUL PERSON I HAVE EVER SPOKEN TOO. I came in probably 7 months ago, It was my first visit to ever see a chiropractor, and was in a lot of pain. I paid like $150-$175  that day just because I told them SPECIFICALLY that I did not want a bill in the mail and I would pay whatever that day just to go ahead and get it out of the way. I saw Dr. Jumper and he was very nice and helpful. I thought that I was going to be very pleased with my experience. 6 MONTHS LATER, I received a bill in the mail from them asking me for $35. Soon after I received the bill in the mail I gave them a call to ask some questions about my bill. She began to tell me that I still owed $35 and that the lady that I was working with got fired because of doing stuff like this and not charging me the full amount. I begin to tell her what I paid that day and I asked specifically if I could take care of it the day of the visit. I then asked her if she could just take care of it for me because it was not my mistake it was the employees. Her tone immediately changed and she said "You still have to pay your bill regardless and if you don't we will be reporting you to collections." I tried to explain to her that I am a loyal customer and I just do not think it is right for me to have to pay this and she kept talking over me and raising her voice. THEN, SHE HUNG UP ON ME. Today I receive a phone call from the business and I was on the other line and could not answer, and immediately call back, and no answer. The point of the matter is, IF YOU ARE RUNNING A LOCAL BUSINESS, YOU ARE TRYING TO IMPROVE YOUR CLIENTELE. IF AN EMPLOYEE DOES SOMETHING WRONG, YOU DO WHATEVER YOU NEED TO DO TO MAKE SURE THAT CUSTOMER IS SATISFIED. REGARDLESS. If you are looking for a local chiropractor DO NOT go to this business unless you are wanting to get SCAMMED. It was not the money aspect, but the fact they were not worried about satisfying the customer and doing what is right.

resp.text: Erika Berry, we're very sorry to hear about your experience.  Please send us an email or give us a call - we'd love to talk with you more about your experience and see if there is anything we can do to remedy the issue.  Whatever happens, we're grateful for your honesty and patronage.

name: Elaine Price
text: Wonderful experience! Has helped me so much since I started coming a month ago.

name: Macie Smith
text: Caring staff and Dr. Jumper is the best!
